1 d_tablero <- expand_grid( y = 1:alto, x = 1:ancho ) |> mutate(id = row_number()) |> mutate(fill = if_else(id %% 2 == 0, "white", "black")) |> select(-id) country_tbl <- tibble( country = d$country, pais = c( "Alemania", "EE.UU.", "India", "Rusia", "Ucrania", "Francia", "Serbia", "España", "Israel", "Polonia", "Hungría", "China" ) ) d_country <- d |> arrange(country) |> mutate(id = row_number()) |> mutate(y = lag(x = id, n = 2, default = 0)) |> mutate(y = id * 2 + y) |> mutate(y = if_else(id == 1, 1, y)) |> mutate(y = y + 1) |> inner_join(country_tbl, by = join_by(country)) |> mutate(pais = fct_reorder(pais, n)) d_y1 <- d |> arrange(country) |> mutate(id = row_number()) |> mutate(y = lag(x = id, n = 2, default = 0)) |> mutate(y = id * 2 + y) |> mutate(y = if_else(id == 1, 1, y)) |> mutate(y = y + 1) |> mutate(x = map(ceiling(n / 2), ~ 1:.x)) |> mutate(largo = map_dbl(x, length)) |> mutate(blancas = c(piezas_blancas, piezas_blancas)) |> mutate(oscuras = c(piezas_oscuras, piezas_oscuras)) |> unnest(x) |> inner_join(d_tablero, by = join_by(x, y)) |> mutate(label = if_else(fill == "white", oscuras, blancas)) d_y2 <- d |> arrange(country) |> mutate(id = row_number()) |> mutate(y = lag(x = id, n = 2, default = 0)) |> mutate(y = id * 2 + y) |> mutate(y = if_else(id == 1, 1, y)) |> mutate(x = map(n - ceiling(n / 2), ~ 1:.x)) |> mutate(largo = map_dbl(x, length)) |> mutate(blancas = c(piezas_blancas, piezas_blancas)) |> mutate(oscuras = c(piezas_oscuras, piezas_oscuras)) |> unnest(x) |> inner_join(d_tablero, by = join_by(x, y)) |> mutate(label = if_else(fill == "white", oscuras, blancas)) d_y <- rbind(d_y1, d_y2) g <- ggplot(d_tablero, aes(x, y, fill = fill)) + geom_tile() + geom_richtext( data = d_y, aes(x + .1, y, label = label), inherit.aes = FALSE, size = 5, fill = NA, label.color = NA ) + geom_text( data = d_country, aes(0, y - .5, label = pais), inherit.aes = FALSE, family = "ubuntu", color = "white", size = 6, hjust = 1 ) + geom_point( data = d_country, aes(ceiling(n / 2) + 1.5, y - .5), inherit.aes = FALSE, shape = 21, size = 8, color = "black", fill = "white", stroke = .4 ) + geom_text( data = d_country, aes(ceiling(n / 2) + 1.5, y - .5, label = n), inherit.aes = FALSE, family = "jet", size = 4, color = "black" ) + scale_x_continuous(breaks = scales::breaks_width(1)) + scale_y_continuous(breaks = scales::breaks_width(1)) + scale_fill_identity() + coord_equal(clip = "off", xlim = c(-3, NA)) + theme_void(base_family = "ubuntu") + theme( plot.background = element_rect(fill = "black") ) ggsave( plot = g, filename = "tidytuesday/2025/semana_38.png", width = 30, height = 25, units = "cm" ) browseURL(paste0(getwd(), "/tidytuesday/2025/semana_38.png")) ``` ::: ## Figura Figura. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- ggplot() ``` ::: Guardo. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave( plot = g, filename = "tidytuesday/2025/semana_38.png", width = 30, height = 30, units = "cm" ) browseURL(paste0(getwd(), "/tidytuesday/2025/semana_38.png")) ``` :::
